```{r}
library(mdsr)
library(Lahman)
library(dplyr)
```
```{r}
hof <- Batting %>% 
  group_by(playerID) %>%
  inner_join(HallOfFame, by = c("playerID" = "playerID")) %>% 
  filter(inducted == "Y", votedBy == "BBWAA") %>% 
  summarise(tH = sum(H), tHR = sum(HR), tRBI = sum(RBI), tSB = sum(SB)) %>% 
  filter(tH > 1000)
hof
```
